Reviews.Title: “Good for a short visit.”
Reviews.Author: boatride7
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night and were given a room on the first floor near the pool. The carpet was worn and the bed had not been changed so we were disappointed with the room off the bat. But the front desk was helpful and quickly remade the bed. The room has a sofa but is not closed off from the sleeping area but I was still able to sleep while my husband used his laptop so that worked out good. The free breakfast was great with a wide variety of items including the hot waffles, hard boiled eggs, various cereals, bagels, and buns with all the side items like cream cheese etc. Free newspapers were available as well and there was plentiful seating. There was a helpful woman who kept everything clean and supplied in the area. The pool did have the overflowing water bucket area for the kids and a small slide and water toy. Beware of the $1.50 per day charge for the safe. You have to ask for them to remove the charge if you don't use it. They told my husband they would refund that amount on my bill but I'm wondering whether that will happen. Overall, an unexciting hotel but ok for the money especially considering the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Better last year”
Reviews.Author: cristina D
Reviews.Content: it's a nice hotel and the room was a good size but things were much cleaner before for example the towels in the bathroom had hair on them which we just through down and asked for new ones I'm not sure if this was over looked or if there is new management but I think they need to work a little harder when they check rooms

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay- Close to everything!!”
Reviews.Author: M R
Reviews.Content: Hotel is right acroos the bridge and close to Shopping Malls, 5 mins drive to Boardwalk/beach - Rooms are nice. It was enough space for 5 ppl in our party- Coming from NYC, it was a def a quieter place to relax and enjoy the beach with my family. Will def book again. GO STEELERS!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: kpchitown
Reviews.Content: I understand why people stay here. The pool seems nice, it's away from hectic crowd yet close enough to the action. However, I found the service at this hotel to be impersonal. I had to stand in front of the front desk for 15 minutes while the two workers were busy on the phone. Finally gave up and went upstairs. Beside this the hotel is not clean. It appears to be clean but after inspection found it to be quite dirty. I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Jill M
Reviews.Content: Room was very clean and comfy, and a great deal too. Everything inside seemed to be well maintained and clean. We did not use the pool, so I cannot review that, although it looked nice. Hotel is not right on the beach, but about a mile down the road from the boardwalk end of the beach. Hotel staff seemed to be friendly, although we weren't there long enough to have much interaction with them. Would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: Bergerfamilytree
Reviews.Content: Much cheaper than the ocean front hotels. About a mile from the beach, an easy drive, and the last week of July we had no problem finding parking within one block of the boardwalk. Parking wasn't expensive. Hotel and room was clean. Would definitely stay here again! We never went down or free breakfast because room was always too crowded.

Reviews.Title: “hotel okay, terrible customer service”
Reviews.Author: pmlynch84
Reviews.Content: I would probably have given this hotel an average rating if it wasnt for the customer service. On checking in there was a problem with our reservation. It seemed we were checked in for a Queen room which says holds 2 people although there were 4 people in our party. The guy behind the desk couldnt have been less helpfull if he tried. Him and and another girl were more interested in talking about their plans that night. Then we inquired about getting the room upgraded or getting another room. He was throwing out all these prices then was pushing us into using our credit card to pay. Eventually we said we'll just take the room we have at the moment. Went down to the room and it turns out theres a pull out couch so the room held 4 no problem. This guy behind the desk would have known this and was clearly just interested in taking more money off us. I would have went back and complained but at that stage all we wanted to do was settle and get on with our vacation. Its probably some of the worst customer service behind a hotel reception Ive ever seen. The room was fairly small, pool was okay. I definetly wouldnt recommend it and wouldnt go back

Reviews.Title: “OC mini vacay”
Reviews.Author: avhyat
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my husband and four kids for a mini-vacay. I was a little leary after reading some of the reviews of the unfriendly staff but decided to go ahead with it as it was the best value for the accomodations--one room that could accomodate 6 people (not too easy to come by) for $200, including taxes and the breakfast. Our overall experience was positive. We arrived early and asked to check in. While the front desk staff is not the friendliest, they did accomodate us with an early check in. The room was clean and spacious. While the hotel is not in the thick of the OC happenings, it is a SHORT drive from all the action and there are plenty of eateries and stores within walking distance of the hotel. The pool was an added plus. Unfortunately, they have a potentially very nice play area in the back of the hotel with basketball hoops and swings but the area was obviously neglected--swings were broken, grass was overgrown, etc. It's a shame they don't maintain it better. This did not interfere with our stay at all since we weren't even aware of it before we got there. I did hear one pretty upset guest complaining about the staff at the breakfast--which was completely overcrowded. It's a very basic kind of spread--don't expect much more than cereal and fruit as the line for the other items is crazy long. I would recommend this hotel for families on a budget or people travelling with pets. The hotel would be wise to give their staff some training in customer service--a smile would be nice--and to clean up their backyard.

Reviews.Title: “Again one of the best”
Reviews.Author: octriptaker
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here now 4+ times and have never had a problem. Clean, friendly staff,great pool, good breakfast and what more can you ask for. Will stay again in the future. They allow animals also but have never smelled or noticed any messes in the rooms we've been in. Stay here you'll Enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: “so much for hospitality...”
Reviews.Author: tess n
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, the rooms were nice, the pool is nice, but some of the staff was rude. There was an older woman working the front desk and she got rather snappy with my husband. There was also a lady working the breakfast buffet who was short with us when we asked a reasonable question. We ended up leaving and going to another hotel on the boardwalk. When I am paying for a room and I have numerous other options, I refuse to be treated poorly.

Reviews.Title: “Ok stay”
Reviews.Author: Hopep1974
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was polite. The cookies in the lobby are a nice touch. The room was clean except for like an inch of dust on our bathroom vent (gross) and a fairly stained carpet. The sofa bed had dirty sheets from the previous occupant.The pillows are über small so bring some from home. The room is spacious enough we had five people. Since we slept in we missed maid service but the front desk gave us whatever we needed. The pool area is nice if u have kids under 10. The breakfast was crowded but good. The circle eggs and really greasy sausage aren't for me but they did have waffle makers and muffins..bagels etc....the real draw back was the breakfast attendant was removing things while people were still lined up...if its a full hotel they should extend the breakfast hours to accommodate the crowds...it was an all over ok place...I liked being away from the inlet and close to the outlets and the turn off for Assateague. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Tracey W
Reviews.Content: Our family goes to Ocean City Maryland each summer and we stay at the Comfort Suites. The staff are great, pleasant, and they smile, which is something you don't see a lot now a days. After a bad experience at a resort in St Maarten my expectation have changed. We were greeted my the staff, the rooms were clean.

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice-Clean and convenient”
Reviews.Author: queban
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at this location several times on trips to Ocean City. It is located in West Ocean City, on Route 50, across from the outlet malls. Convenient to shopping, lots of restaurants (less crowds and traffic than on Ocean Hwy), couple of marinas and the shuttle bus that will take you into OC is about 3 minutes away. Rooms are clean. Staff is very good. They allow pets for an extra fee. Amazing breakfast every day. Exercise room has very old machines so don't plan on using the "gym", but they have a decent pool and tot lot if you are travelling with little ones. Rooms are large and very clean...no sign of bugs or the previous occupant. Easy trip to chincoteague island where you will find a beautiful beach, wild ponies and lots more. Google it

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Family of Six”
Reviews.Author: Timothy A
Reviews.Content: This hotel was clean, comfortable, and conveniently located. We spent one night here on a two-day trip to Assateague Island. The hotel was easy to find and far enough away from the congested Ocean City beachfront. Across the street was a Tanger Outlet mall with many shops for the family to visit in the evening, fast food and sit-down restaurants within walking distance (and Starbucks), and a great ice cream stand less than a block away. My older children used the exercise room and the wireless internet. The breakfast was awesome, and though there were many guests, was kept well stocked.

Reviews.Title: “Will Not Stay At Again”
Reviews.Author: Lisa S
Reviews.Content: My husband is very particular about where we stay and we wanted to give a new hotel a try. When we came to this hotel we were eager to check in and relax in the whirlpool tub next to the fire place. We were not eager to discover the musky smell as we opened the door of room 314 or find that the room was poorly cleaned. Then whirlpool tub had hair all along the back edge of it as well as little black hairs at the bottom around the drain. The tile floor where the whirlpool tub is located was also cover in little black hairs. I asked my husband if I should call the front desk and have someone come re clean the room he said no. The room should have been properly cleaned the first time. My husband was so disgusted that he went to the food lion to buy bleach, disinfected spray, and rubber gloves and began cleaning our room. He cleaned all of the tubs, toilet, sink, and the floor. After cleaning the floor he said it looked like the little black hairs were someone’s pubic hairs. He was so mad that he did not even want to stay another night and we checked out as soon as we woke up the next morning. I believe it is pretty bad when you finally get a babysitter to get away with your husband and my husband has to go out and get cleaning supplies and clean on our vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good! Better with a few adjustments!”
Reviews.Author: Angvigarcia25
Reviews.Content: Good qualities: good location, service, cleanliness. Negative: they only gave one roll of toilet paper. We were 5 people. We called to ask for more and got a half used roll haha. So we had to ask for more. And it's all cheap dollar store brand. I understand cutting cost but really? The other issue is the pool. It is only opened from 1030 am til 8. Then closed or multiple 15 - 20 minute times including 7pm, for cleaning and testing. We complained to staff which told us that they don't own the pool and cannot have a say in it. Perhaps they should think about owning the pool, as I've never staying in a hotel with such odd pool rules.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to meet with family and friends”
Reviews.Author: Joanne F
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a friendly and helpful staff. We met some other family members and had plenty of room in the suite to sit and visit. It was so very nice to be able to enjoy breakfast without having to go out to a restaurant. I was glad to find out this is a peet friendly hotel as the next trip we will probably have our westie with us. Thanks so much for performing an at home atmosphere! Joanne from DE

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: thatchLancaster_Pa_
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights. Hotel is very, very clean. Staff was exceptionally friendly. The hotel provides free breakfast in the morning which was great - includes your choice of waffles, eggs, sausage, toast, fresh fruit, various breads, danish and good coffee. Rooms and entire hotel are well maintained. Hotel is located about a mile or two from downtown Ocean City. Free wireless internet is a little slow but available in rooms. Plenty of parking and easy access to major highways. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “DOG LOVERS PARADISE”
Reviews.Author: steve v
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this several times and always on the upper floors Rooms are very clean and very comfortable Last stay was a problem as i was not aware of the very liberal pet policy the hotel maintains. I was given a bottom floor room which is where the big smelly Barking dogs stay ... I was awaken in the early Am with the smell of previously deposited Dog P_ _ P in my room only to hear dogs close by Barking and Barking. Front desk could have cared less and it was obviously my fault for not asking about the pet policy or requesting an upper floor To the front desk Central res does not disclose the pet policy for this property . I like Pets i just Dont want them in Hotel room Bad Bad Hotel Policy MAY OR MAY NOT COME BACK TO THIS PROPERTY.

Reviews.Title: “Sweet Heart Nite”
Reviews.Author: nornette1977
Reviews.Content: nice clean room, great big hot tub, alot of space to move around , and the love the fire plase "Need better internet service"

Reviews.Title: “Surprising property in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: sjohnso6
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot for work so when I travel for personal reasons (we stayed for the Race for the Cure race with friends) I am always very picky. Tourist towns make me nervous because their hotels are usually a bit run down and used. This hotel is tucked away from the ocean but what you get in cleanliness and the facility by far makes up for that. Quiet property, friendly helpful desk attendants, lots of breakfast items and CLEAN - by far my most important piece. The only piece I would say is that the pillows are small but that's not the end of the world, just ask for more :) yes, yes, yes, stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Great quality family time”
Reviews.Author: ballersmom
Reviews.Content: Great place to spend an overnight in Ocean City. Not too close but close enough to the boardwalk for families who want the peace and quiet not always at the beach. It was a surprise trip for my mom and kids and they had a great time as did I. Breakfast had a great selection and wasn't overly crowded. We will be returning soon...

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected Delight”
Reviews.Author: Dennis K
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel by mistake and was very satisfied with the room, 2 queen beds, and the free breakfast buffet was great. By being off Ocean highway, got to see more of West Ocean City and found different places to eat. Would definitely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Staying Again!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Eddie N
Reviews.Content: Great location along with the great staff. The manager Chris was a big help and the free breakfast buffet was awesome. Very clean, spacious, and friendly people. My girlfriend and I felt so welcome, the staff treated us like we were one of their own. Would most certainly recommend anyone stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: xpuha23
Reviews.Content: Had an early morning fishing trip Wednesdat Feb.22, 2012 and just wanted something close and inexpesive. Lots of restuarants nearby with Carrabbas almost next door.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: Cristal0505
Reviews.Content: Great location but not much of a view. Clean, spacious rooms and courteous staff. Excellent value for the money. Nice breakfast buffet and the pool and in-room jacuzzi were very clean. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “very nice place, friendly and helpful staff, had a great visit”
Reviews.Author: raperlak
Reviews.Content: Needed to get a couple days away to visit the beach and boardwalk. Been to this hotel about 3 years ago and while a little off the beaten path, very close (about a 5 minute ride to the inlet parking area). Found a great room with fireplace and jacuzzi tub for about $60.00 per night. This included a very good breakfast, free coffee 24x7, and sometimes cookies. Outdoor pool was closed for season and no indoor pool.

Reviews.Title: “We were surprised by how nice this place is.”
Reviews.Author: cjajsmom
Reviews.Content: We had to make an unexpected trip to Berlin, MD, due to a family emergency and the closest hotel to the hospital was the Comfort Suites. Now, I've been a member of the "Choice Rewards" program for many years so I am familiar with this chain. However, I had not stayed in a Comfort Suites. We were pleasantly surprised. The property is well-maintained. Outside, in addition to the pool area (closed now), there is a picnic area with a grill and tables, playground, horseshoe area and basketball net. We took a nice stroll around a small pond. Inside, there is a game room and exercise room. Our suite was very nice. It was a bit smaller than we've had at other "suites" hotels, but it was quite sufficient for our needs. Everything was in good condition. The bed was comfortable but the pillows were terrible. We will bring our own if we need to stay here again. Good shower however I felt like I couldn't rinse the soap off; later I realized that it was not the soap but the fact that this area has very soft water that makes you feel like you aren't rinsed off. Wifi is available but very slow. Microwave and small refrigerator are available as is a coffeemaker. There is not an actual kitchen area (no sink, stove, etc.) as we've had in other suites. Breakfast is included in your room rate. Our breakfast choices on Sunday were outstanding. Scrambled "eggs" (not real eggs) and bacon (perfectly prepared) in addition to the continental offerings. Coffee was hot and abundant. Good selection of pastries. Monday was a different story. According to the gal at the desk, the guy that was supposed to do breakfast didn't show up and she was doing the best she could. "Eggs" were flat rounds meant for a English muffin. Bite-size sausage accompanied the eggs. Both ran out quickly. She was doing the best she could. We hoped for better on Tuesday but the meat offering this day (along with the same flat egg rounds) was a mystery. Sized for an English muffin, they were pink and tasted like Spam. Seriously, Comfort Suites, Spam? Just very disappointing. The only employees we encountered were those at the front desk who were all warm and friendly and the man who did breakfast on Sunday, who was very present and efficient. (I think it was the same person on Tuesday but he was not as visible, we only saw him come out from the pantry area to replace the coffee.) Locally there are a number of restaurants and shopping areas. To my husband's delight, there was only one building separating us from Dumsers Dairyland, so we did take a few walks there so he could get his favorite ice cream. From this location, you can be in Ocean City in minutes, so for a family that wants a beach vacation but doesn't want to be right in the thick of things, this is a good place to stay. We would stay here again if the need arises. I did expect the room rate to be a bit lower (we paid $69.99 a night) since this location is a few miles from the ocean in West Ocean City, and it is the "off" season. We were charged the same rate for all three nights, regardless of whether it was a weekend or not.

Reviews.Title: “Really love this place...”
Reviews.Author: ricshi
Reviews.Content: Great for kids, they have a very large outdoor pool with all these fun toys in it. Place is pretty central although off the beach. Rooms are large, clean, and really you get a lot for your dollar. There's also free wifi, and most importantly, FREE breakfast!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Glad we stayed at this hotel. Thanks to tripadvisor reviews. Great find.”
Reviews.Author: Tokya G
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised by the friendliness and easy going attitude of the hotel staff. The hot breakfast was very well designed- 2 waffle makers, hot coffee, hot chocolate, danish, bagels, fresh fruit, sausage, eggs (hardboiled and scrambled), and much much more. It is a short drive to the beach; not inconvenient at all. We went back to the beach after we have checked out and my little nephew actually went back in the water (so he needed to shower again!!!). We went back to Comfort Suites; to our surprise, the staff allowed him to use the outdoor shower by the pool. I do not really ever bother to write reviews for anything but I had to with this one because it is so well deserved. I received the same level of service regardless of who was at the counter. For that reason, i am rating this hotel as EXCELLENT.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: travelclient
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Comfort Suites for 2 nights while visiting Ocean City. Prior to booking, I was concerned about the proximity to the beach (it is approximately a mile away). However, having been there, I found the location to be satisfactory. The drive to the beach takes less than five minutes, if there is no traffic. It is close to the OC Outlets and other shopping venues. Check-in and check-out were satisfactory. As to the hotel, it was fine for our family's needs. Since there were five of us, I requested a rollaway bed, to accommodate one of the children. However, we didn't spend much time in the room. The breakfast was adequate, similar to choices offered at other hotels in this star category. The outdoor pool in this hotel is wonderful for the kids. In fact, as we were pulling into the hotel for check-in, my wife and kids couldn't believe we would be staying here. We only spent a few hours, in the pool, as most of our time was spent lounging around on the beach. There is a picnic area in the back of the hotel with a small kids' play area; it's nice for younger kids. We didn't try the fitness center or the business center. The price was certainly less than the rates being charged, closer to the beach. And, the hotel was newer than most properties lining the beach area. So, overall a decent price to service ratio, compared to other lodging in OC.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel/Great pool”
Reviews.Author: NYCRonnie
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel at the last minute based on reviews posted on trip advisor. The hotel is maintained extremely well. The rooms are clean and nicely decorated. Every morning a deluxe continental breakfast is served (free). To my utter amazement they had a waffle maker along with eggs, sausage, bread, pastries, hot/cold cereal, yogurt, fresh fruit, tea, cover, juice, and milk. We found this to be a money saver and each of us was able to eat a satisfying breakfast every morning during our stay. This hotel is a five minute drive to the beach and it will cost you a dollar an hour to park at the beach. The pool in this hotel is great for children. The pool is sectioned off so that the small children will be out of of the way of the older children. The water slide was a hit for young and old. The water snake is great for the older kids. My girls spent hours in the pool which by the way has a lifeguard at all times. We found some great end of the summer fashion steals at the outlet mall across the road. If you can believe this I found a Marc Jacobs bathing suit that sold for $160 retail and I paid $29, also a Ralph Lauren infant bathing suit that was retail at $54 an I paid $3, both were fashion steals at Marshall's. In closing this hotel is a great place to stay, you are away from the hustle and bustle of the beach crowd and traffic, but close enough if you want to go have a taste of it. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Much money for styrofoam breakfast...”
Reviews.Author: FEPF
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this place for 1 night, which is close to Ocean City and its beaches - without having to stay in the crowded center itself. It is nice that they serve breakfast, BUT: it was very dissatisfying to get your breakfast in all styrofoam, cups, plates and cutlery. I expected a bit more for 300 USD a night! I think it is not too difficult to serve tea/coffee in china... I may also advise to watch out for safe charges - even if you directly book the room at the front desk! Next time, I will prefer staying in a nice and comfy bed and breakfast in the area to find more value, charme and athmosphere for the money!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad.”
Reviews.Author: KeepGoingPhilly
Reviews.Content: I travelled to this hotel on business and stayed two nights. The location is great. You get to be near the Ocean City Boardwalk without having to stay directly on it. The accomodations are nice and clean even if they are a bit outdated. The WiFi worked great (which is always very important to me). While I didn't use the pool, it looks like it's a great place to take the kids (almost a mini water park) to wind down at the end of a long day. The breakfast wasn't anything to write home about, but there was plenty of it. The staff was okay, although they were pretty loud even late at night. All in all, I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay !!”
Reviews.Author: AndreaNJ
Reviews.Content: I found the Comfort Suites at the last minute, we were going to Myrtle Beach but had a change of plans. I found the hotel to be just what we were looking for. The beach/boardwalk is just 5 min drive down the street. We did not want to stay at the beach so the location of the Comfort Suites was perfect. There is so much around the hotel in walking distance: outlet mall across the street, Dunkin Donuts, KFC, Taco Bell, Outback. Also, Baja Amusements (go-karting, arcade, mini golf). The hotel itself was very nice and clean. The hotel is "pet friendly" and we saw people outside with their dogs but did not see them in the hotel and no obvious signs of animals!! Breakfast was good, waffle maker, eggs/sausage, toast etc, everything you need to get you started in the morning The "Bold" coffee was delicious ! They have a outdoor pool, exercise room, game room. The business center was closed unfortunately because they were waiting for a new computer - would have been a huge inconvenience for a business traveler. The room was comfortable, we had 2 queens, no sofa - there was a chair and ottoman. The fridge and microwave really comes in handy. If going to Ocean City again I would definitely stay here !!

Reviews.Title: “great pool! comfy bed! BREAKFAST!”
Reviews.Author: lovelylala225
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old son and I went on a 'mommy and me' trip to OC.... we had a blast! I am very VERY picky about where I stay due to my (almost) neurotic, crazy fear of bed bugs. I'm serious. I reviewed this hotel very closely before I booked and even though there may have been cheaper alternatives, I don't want to spend thousands of dollars trying to erradicate bed bugs from my home. Anyway, no signs of bugs. Bed was very comfy and room was pretty clean( carpet in the room could use a steam cleaning, but i'm not spending to much time on the floor LOL) my son and I LOVED the pool, it has water slide, alot of water features, and isn't very deep so the little ones can go all over the pool. Even better, the hotel has a lifeguard on duty! that's uncommon for a hotel pool. and to top it all off, they offer a hot breakfast every morning! make your own waffles, eggs, sausage, juices, coffee, various pastries, what more could you ask for!!! very plesant time for our trip to ocean city.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to OC!”
Reviews.Author: KissXX
Reviews.Content: Comfortable room. The pillows, bedding, etc...great! There was plenty of room to move around! We didn't have our dog with us, but I saw it was pet friendly and I was impressed with that as it was clean, and everyone was respectful with their dogs. It was only ten minutes from OC, Second Street. Other attractions were close by like the outlets and right next door was Carrabba's that we would highly recommend!! Excellent food and service!! Also, right next door on the opposite side is Dumpsters. Go there for great homemade ice cream! Hoopers is a short drive for some great seafood! Assateaque Island is only 8 miles away, and everyone should go there to see the unique wild ponies and experience the beaches there in the state park. On the way we went to Decantur Diner. It is very quaint, cute 50's diner with excellent breakfast choices. The pool at the Comfort Suites is larger than most with a variety of extras like a small slide, floating snake, and such for kids. Breakfast at Comfort Suites was good. The choices were many with a variety of fruits, muffins, pastries, waffles to make yourself, and the coffee was excellent!

Reviews.Title: “Clean Quiet Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Phil6184
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night and was very pleased with the cleanliness and sleep quality of the room. The staff is very friendly. I was not visiting the beach so the location was fine for me. Beach goers will be about a half mile or so from the beach. That is a consideration. I would also suggest to management that the TV needs to be updated.

Reviews.Title: “Watch out for safe charges”
Reviews.Author: Notrevely
Reviews.Content: Many motels try to slip room safe charges by you. This motel takes it a step farther. If you catch the safe charge at check-in, the clerks have been instructed not to remove it. They will force you to have the bill corrected at checkout. Since the credit card has already been charged and your receipt has been slipped under your door, they know you will not take the time (if you remember it at all). I don't mind paying extra for a room. I do mind being tricked and trapped into paying for something I do not want. Besides that, everything else was pretty typical for a Comfort Suites. Only other real complaint is very slow and unreliable internet.

Reviews.Title: “Surprise Weekend Getaway”
Reviews.Author: TheWatcher151
Reviews.Content: This was a planned Weekend Getaway for my Girlfriend's Birthday and I must say that Comfort Suites totally took care of us! The location of the hotel was perfect because her favorite Restaurant was right next door (Carrabbas Italian Grill), there was a Shopping Plaza across the street, and the beach was less than a mile away. When we arrived to the hotel and my girlfriend walked in to see the Jacuzzi, she was instantly "pleased" and showed her gratitude later that evening. ;-) - The room was very clean, the staff was very courteous, and did I mention the Jacuzzi made me a happy man for 2 nights in a row?! LOL!! I think the only problem with this location was that we were awakened by barking dogs 2 mornings in a row. But hey, there's a positive to everything cause we definitely took advantage of the early morning wake-up...and then went back to sleep! Thanks Comfort Suites, when I return with my family and dog, I'll be sure to stay at this location!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: sbl618
Reviews.Content: Booked last minute for a great price and very happy with our stay. This hotel is very clean and well maintained. Delicious free hot breakfast couldn't get better! My family would definately stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “one of the cleanist, friendliest hotels I have ever been to”
Reviews.Author: gary761949
Reviews.Content: everything I needed was available and easy to use. quiet and clean

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Suites & staff”
Reviews.Author: creativewoods
Reviews.Content: The facility and staff are outstanding. They will go out of the way to make certain your stay is comfortable. The rooms are very clean. Fantastic full breakfast included every morning. We have already made reservations for Valentines weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Love it!”
Reviews.Author: MDBarbara
Reviews.Content: I had to make a last minute reservation at this hotel, and did so with no problems. The room was exceptionally clean. The beds were very comfortable. The room was very much up to date. The breakfast was so so. The folks at the front desk were so very nice and helpful. I read a previous report of a bed bug incident and that scared me, so I inspected the beds carefully before unpacking and did not see a thing wrong. I will stay here again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: travelpappy
Reviews.Content: Stayed on October 6, 2010 and found this hotel to be one of the nicest in the Ocean City, MD area. The staff was pleasant, the lobby, dining area and rooms were very clean. The hotel is located close to restaurants and less than five minutes to the beach. The outdoor pool was closed, but looks like it would be fun for the whole family in the summer.

Reviews.Title: “Close to beach but far enough away !”
Reviews.Author: countryboypa
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on a thursday night & friday night. Thursdays price was great about $72.00, Friday it went to an outragious $170.99. Stayed in a King bed suite both nights. Carpet was a little worn, bedspread was worn and faded looking. TV was outdated, and bathtub was small and outdated. Now the good stuff. Check-in staff was great.,location was awesome, close to everything but yet away from the boardwark bussel. Very quiet setting room was huge with nice fridge and microwave. Nice outdoor pool, however, disapointed there was no indoor pool. Comp.breakfast was better than most, and breakfast area was nice. Hotel very nice and modern in lobby. Rooms just need a touch-up. Would definently stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: AndyPinMaryland
Reviews.Content: I booked the room last minutefor Bike Week. I felt something bite me during the night. Inspected the sheets and pillows to discover approximatly 20 or more bed bugs. The staff was very professional, apologetic, and refunded our money.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and relaxing getaway.”
Reviews.Author: OC_lover_8
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay at this hotel because it is one of the few pet friendly hotels in Ocean City. We would go back even without the dog. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The soundproofing is incredible. There was a huge dog barking in a room down the hall, but the only place he could be heard was right in front of their door. That made us feel much more relaxed in case our dog happened to bark. The pool was very entertaining and fun. The daily fresh baked cookies were a nice touch. It is true that the location is in West Ocean City, but honestly we enjoyed being off the beaten path. There is a shuttle to and from the boardwalk when you don't want to drive over the bridge. The only complaint we had was with the pillows. Take your own unless you like squishy feather pillows. All in all a very nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Again worth the stay”
Reviews.Author: octriptaker
Reviews.Content: Stayed here again this year and was well worth it again. Clean, comfortable, and my daughter loves the pool. We stayed in the first room coming from the pool and was a bit scared of noise etc but was no problem at all didnt even notice. Would stay here again and probably will.

Reviews.Title: “Kids loved the Cool Pool, but very disappointed in the cleanliness of the room!”
Reviews.Author: sandycheeks0521
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this comfort suites on a last minute trip to the beach! The main reason being was because my kids saw the pool and wanted to stay!!! So I booked a room for a few nights. We have stayed in many hotels and I was a bit disappointed with the cleanliness of the room. I found big chunk of food crumbs on the floor when opened the fridge door, stains on the couch, a very dirty shower curtain, and the worst was the black mold and mildew in the tub around the hand rail. Things that bleach and a proper cleaning would get rid of. I went out and bought clorox wipes and lysol to wipe things down. I am not one to make a fuss and complain. I guess I just feel like when you pay to stay in a hotel it should be clean!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding hotel with fabulous suites, friendly staff, service and totally wheelchair accessible.”
Reviews.Author: OCMDluvsince1950
Reviews.Content: Since a very small child in 1950 and numerous OC trips with my family, Ocean City has been my favorite place to visit. Except for the old and no longer existing hotels: Rideau and Commander, this hotel is at the top of the list of where I will always book my stays. Yes, it is not located on ocean front, but is less than a mile drive away and the Comfort Suites in West Ocean City is outstanding. My 30 yr. old best friend and I loved this location. The room was extremely clean and comfortable. Loved how the suite was sectioned into living, sleeping and work areas. Never had a arch sectioning in a guest room.... I am wheelchair bound and the bathroom and entire suite was totally accessible for my use. Without a traveling friend, I could have managed this suite on my own. This is an unique feature for this hotel. It meets all ADA specifications! The free continental breakfast from 7:30-9:30 AM was beyond expectations. Great variation of foods and best ever served with no charge. From this location, there are many restaurants available for lunch and dinner. Great variety of types of food and price range & super outlet mall across the highway. I strongly disagree with several reviews of the cat lover from Baltimore and others...... With the conditions in the USA in 2010, a hotel check-in is throughly efficient when validating the identity of the guest checking in with verification of driver's license and requesting a home phone number. This procedure is not unique for this site as I previously have had to supply this information at hotels all over the USA. (If you leave something behind in the suite, you can be contacted at home. Great feature.) Suite was totally clean and available before the check in time as it was occupied the night before our arrival. Check In procedures were efficient and fast. We heard absolutely no dogs barking within the hotel and several pets were booked into rooms specifically designated as pet rooms. Yes, my dog was registered with us and travels with me all over the country. Thank you for allowing my fur companion to stay with us. Responsible pet owners take appropriate care of their pets at all times. Throughly enjoyed this visit and am booking several other stays for this year. This visit was for the Ocean City Springfest. Kudos to the staff of this Comfort Suite!!!!!!! 5***** rating!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Bewitched168
Reviews.Content: Took my boys here for a weekend Spring Break getaway. We took our dog, which didn't leave us with much in the way of hotel options. When we arrived at the hotel an hour before our check-in time, we were told no rooms were ready yet. We were able to do all the check-in paperwork and were told to just pick up the key in an hour at check-in time. The boys and I then went to the beach and boardwalk and spent 3 hours walking around enjoying ourselves until we all decided we were tired hungry and that it was time to go back to the hotel for a break. We got back to the hotel at 5 p.m. (2 hours after check-in time), I was told the room wasn't quite ready as they'd "had some problems." I was pretty annoyed, and when I asked how much longer it would be since it was already 2 hours past check-in time, I was told "not much longer" and the desk clerk then went to check on the room. When she returned, she said they were "cleaning the room right now and it shouldn't be much longer." In the meantime, the boys and I sat in the breakfast area to eat our pizza and watch TV. The room was ready in about 20 minutes, and as we were waiting for the elevator to go up to our room, the desk clerk told me she would waive the pet fee and give us 10% off the room rate. I was pretty surprised and happy to get that offer, especially after a previous bad experience at a Crowne Plaza. It definitely made our wait worth it, especially since the pet fee is $35 (a littly pricey, esp. when you only have a Chihuahua)!!! Our room was nice - 2 double beds, sofa bed, fridge, microwave, etc. Very comfortable! The continental breakfast was good (waffles, fruit, etc.) My only other complaint was that when we checked out, the desk clerk that morning (not the same woman who offered the waived pet fee & 10% off the room rate) said the pet fee had been waived, but 10% had not been taken off the room rate, and he didn't bother to change that. I was a little disappointed to say the least.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing and romantic”
Reviews.Author: vacationlady1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Comfort Suites after spending the previous night at the Comfort Inn in Rehobeth Beach and wished we would have spend 2 nights here. We had a suite with a fireplace and heart shaped whirlpool tub. This was a great room. I was concerned about being at the top of the stairs/elevator but the way the room was positioned, we did not hear much hall noise. The breakfast was typical waffles, cereal, toast, fruite, etc. This was a great deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and Pet Friendly”
Reviews.Author: dynadog
Reviews.Content: My family and I had a wonderful stay for Delmarva Bike Event. We took our two Papillions, Dyna and Dex, with us. The staff, Stephanie, George, Don and Mary, made our stay very enjoyable. The hotel was clean and well maintained. Everyone was very helpful, friendly and most of all loved pets. We will be back for future stays. Keep up the Good Work. Thank you....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Great Value!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jcrow1060
Reviews.Content: My husband myself and my 2 kids stayed here for our family vacation and we definitely enjoyed our stay, Staff was very accommodating and pleasant. Rooms were very clean. Very nice pool however we were very disappointed in the continental breakfast. Breakfast ended early 9;30am the staff had already cleaned up before so if you went down at 9;15 there wasn't anything to eat they were putting everything away. Seating was horrible more people than tables, huge line for waffle maker. Laundry facilities only had 1 wash and 1 dryer. Overall we did enjoy our stay. Location was fine even though it wasn't on broad walk it was a short drive to beach and broad walk. To me cleanliness is important and this hotel definitely rates high in that area. Recommend and would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE - wont recommend to anyone”
Reviews.Author: cpeldo
Reviews.Content: PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING WITH THIS HOTEL!!! My family (6 adults and 4 kids) was treated as dirty as the hotel room!! To list a few things that were totally discusting.... my sister had to vacumme our rooms at 10:30pm because it had not been done and there was no one there to do it, pubic hairs in the tub and all over the floor, DIRTY WASH CLOTHS over the shower curtain, moldy shower curtain, dirty sticky counters, take home food in fridge, only one set of towels in each room, tip envelope from cleaning crew... etc etc. this is by far the worst experience i have had ANYWHERE especially from a hotel. At $183 per room per night (we had 2 rooms) we were beyond disapointed! Not expecting a Hilton experience but I have stayed in a $80 hotel that was much nicer.... Worst yet all we received for this horrible filthy experience was an $80 voucher to another one of there most likely dirty motels (which will probably be given to a bum) Every employee there treated us very unprofessionally and were extremely rude to all of us like this was our fault!! This is the only 2nd bad review I have written in my life which means it must be pretty horrible for me to complain...

Reviews.Title: “This is the place”
Reviews.Author: PoconoJack
Reviews.Content: Stayed Aug 18/22, This hotel is very good for families.The kids, loved the pool and the breakfast. The room was very nice,clean and I like the safe in the room. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The only thing I didn't care for was the pets being allowed in the hotel.(allergies)

Reviews.Title: “It's a family hotel, lots of kids are around. For romance I would choose diffent place.”
Reviews.Author: JuliaNewYork_NY
Reviews.Content: Pros: lifeguard on the pool every day, a lot of stuff for breakfast(fruits, wafers, cereals, oatmeal etc.), staff is very nice and helpful. The weird thing about this hotel is that this 100% non-smoking(however there is a designated smoking area), but pets are allowed. Cons: the pool opens late(at 10am), so I wouldn't able to get sun tan from the morning sun when I wanted to, and we had to drive over the bridge to get to the beach. So the only thing I didn't like most is the location, really inconvenient

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable outside OC proper”
Reviews.Author: cpwhip
Reviews.Content: This is a newer property just over the Rt. 50 bridge on the outskirts of town. The proerty is well maintained and the housekeeping exceptional. There is small play area for the kids with a picnic area also. The pool has a lifeguard, probably a requirement and is great for kids, even though we were not traveling with any.

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice for the Family”
Reviews.Author: octriptaker
Reviews.Content: My family and I just stayed at this hotel and we enjoyed every part of it. The hotel was clean and the room was spotless. The hotel staff was great but did have problems when calling before we arrived. On-site staff was great and had no problems. Breakfast was great but a big crowded if you showed up late. The pool area was great and was very kid friendly. This place was in a good location but if you want to stay right on the beach this is not recommended. We as a family liked this spot very much as it was somewhat out of the hustle and bustle of the boardwalk and the night life. Very convenient to the to OC strip and easy to navigate to other areas around. This was a great family hotel. We did not take our pet to this hotel but we did see other families with their pets. The staff was good to the pets and even offered treats at the desk. Overall our 4 day say was great and did not have any problems at all. The only thing I had a problem with was leaving. We will stay here again sometime in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A great disappointment!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mrp483
Reviews.Content: We had stayed in this hotel in 2008, it was very clean and nice, but it must have changed management, we had feces all over everything, the bathroom was filthy. We were told the room would be comped and low and behold when we got home the hotel had charged our card. It took 3 weeks and many overdraft charges to get the hotel to reverse the charges and give us back our money. I will not stay at this hotel ever again. The cleaning staff couldn't speak English, so we had a hard time making her understand what feces was. There were many dogs here as well, when we were having breakfast one came by all wet and proceeded to shake himself off right next to the diningroom, how disgusting, we were bit up by what I assume were fleas. If you have a pet to bring along this might be the hotel for you, as most of the staff had their own dogs at work with them.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: jenzibaba8
Reviews.Content: Great room....very clean and NICE!!! My boyfriend and I stayed in the room with the heart shaped jacuzzi tub...It was wonderful and very romantic!! The only thing we didn't like about it was the room was right off the elevator so you could hear all the noise and traffic of other guests going on and coming off the elevator...other than that, GREAT STAY!! Would most definetely stay again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, reasonable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Thrillrider
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Comfort Suites over Valentine's Day weekend on a Friday night. We originally had just booked one night (Saturday) at the Dunes Manor, but decided to come down one night early. I booked the jacuzzi room with the fireplace and it was very nice/romantic. This is the second time I've stayed at this hotel and they have some great off-season rates. Our room was very clean as was the rest of the hotel. The employee at check-in didn't have much of a personality, but the woman who checked us out was quite friendly. The breakfast was average, but not bad for a free breakfast included in the rate. One of the previous reviews docked the hotel for it's location. The hotel was in a perfect location for us as we were going to both Assateague Island and Ocean City. I wouldn't select this hotel as a 'resort' if you are looking for a one week stay in Ocean City because you would often have to battle the Route 50 bridge traffic into town (note that there were construction signs up saying that work would start on the bridge this week and that the local paper said that it may last until Memorial Day - one lane in each direction closed over the bridge). However, this is a great off-season choice or for the traveler who might just want to spend one or two days at a hotel in Ocean City (and don't care about not being 'at the beach'). This hotel certainly beats most of the dumps in Ocean City!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: beachymd
Reviews.Content: Just returned from comfort suites ocean city and had a wonderful stay. Comfortable beds, safe, clean, early check in, GREAT pool for my children ages 7,6 1.5. Breakfast was a little crowded but was good. Drive into ocean city was a breeze (5 min.). For the price $150 it can't be beat. Other hotels were at least $70 more per night. I would absolutely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nonnap
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Comfort Suites Ocean City on Ocean Gateway for two nights. We had a first floor double queen suite near the lobby. The room was tastefully decorated and had two queen beds, desk, chair, dresser and TV, then a half divider with a sitting area with a sofa and coffee table. The room was equipped with a coffeemaker, complimentary coffee and tea, a microwave, a small fridge, hair dryer and iron and ironing board. There is a safe in the room that you can use for a cost of $1.50 a day. The bathroom was quite large and the entire unit was very clean. Coffee, tea, hot chocolate is available in the breakfast area 24 hrs. The hotel has a game room for children (coins needed) and an exercise room for those over the age of 18. There is an outdoor pool only which was not open yet for the season. Ice machines are provided and there are a couple of vending machines as well. The included continental breakfast was quite ample offering sausage, eggs, bagels (both mini and regular), juices, fruit, donuts, donut holes, coffeecake, rolls, english muffins, white and wheat breads, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, applesauce, 3 different cereals, make your own waffles, mini pastries, coffee, tea, hot chocolate. One of the best continental breakfasts I have come across. The entire hotel is very, very clean and bright. Wireless internet is provided free of charge in the rooms and worked great. Also no problem using cell phones. Lots of restaurants nearby and is right next door to Carrabba's Italian restaurant. Across the street are the Ocean City factory outlets and about 5 miles away is Assateague with the wild horses. Cross the 50th street bridge (now under construction) and you are on the Boardwalk in about 2 miles from the hotel. Luggage carts are provided for your use in loading/unloading your belongings. TV reception was a little weak, but we weren't there to watch TV. We had a room that could be used as a connecting room with the one next door and the only problem we had was with the people in that room. They were very noisy at 5:30 am each morning waking us up so I don't know if all rooms would have that problem or if it was just the fact that they could be adjoining rooms and the door replaces the wall for that purpose. Heard nothing from the other side of our room.

Reviews.Title: “Best Choice Hotel properity in OC!”
Reviews.Author: Richk582
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best Choice Hotel property in OC! This is a new, modern, VERY CLEAN, new hotel. Only a few minute ride over the Rt 50 bridge to the inlet, it is well worth it! Great continental breakfast which included eggs, sausage, Belgian waffles, pastries, cereal, and fresh fruit. The room was large, very clean, very modern, comfy bed, large bathroom... nothing to say but EXCELLENT! Having a fridge and microwave was nice. It lacks an indoor pool and hot tub, which would have been nice during our stay in Feb but its no big deal. Fitness center was well appointed but small. If you want a clean room in a modern building, this is your best choice, no mistaken!

Reviews.Title: “Nice upper scale motel.”
Reviews.Author: user621
Reviews.Content: Comfort Suites - Eastbound US 50/Ocean Gateway. I stay here when I work with the fishing boats at the harbor and probably spend 30 days or more a year here. Up front, it's not cheap in season, but nothing here is. Out off season, the prices are very competitive for the quality of experience, in my opinion. It's not at the beach, but there is a park and ride down the road a half-mile:$1.00 fare good for the whole day. That saves a huge hassle of driving into town (especially if you're not familiar with the traffic patterns there), looking for parking while dodging the other vacationers crossing the street. Maybe not so convenient if you want to walk from your motel room to dinner, but there is a Carrabas within short walking distance, and many restaurants on US 50 close by - including an Outback, Applebee's, Sakura Japanese steakhouse and sushi, Marlin Moon Grill, and several seafood restaurants around the harbor. Dumser's ice cream is a conveniently short walk for dessert. Food Lion supermarket and CVS drug store are within walking distance on Rt. 611. I find the motel staff extremely friendly and helpful, but this may be because I spend so much time here. The motel is smoke-free, although the air freshener is a bit overwhelming. Wireless internet in all the rooms and a work desk and chair are convenient for business people. Being off the main drag I find it more peaceful and conducive to relaxing or getting work done. If you find yourself in town during Senior week (high school seniors), bike week, or car show week, and want to avoid the noise all day long, this is a nice, relatively quiet option. Free breakfast with waffle makers, scrambled eggs and sausages, as well as pastries, bread, bagels, dry cereals, coffee, hot water for tea, juices. Coffee and hot water for tea (and tea bags) are available in thermos carafes all day along with a milk dispenser. Coffee maker, small refrigerator and microwave in some rooms (all the rooms I've stayed in, not positive if every room has them). I've always found the rooms, common areas, and grounds clean and neat - at least as clean and neat as you can be with guests tracking beach sand and kids around. Small workout room with a limited selection of machines, video arcade room, washer and dryer are available. The outdoor pool looks kid-friendly, but I've never used it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place For Families!”
Reviews.Author: Mama2Boyz
Reviews.Content: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The rooms were clean, staff was friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was GREAT! There is a pool that is designed for kids and mine absolutely loved it! It was a great alternative for when you don't feel like going to the beach. Even though the hotel is not on the "strip" it is well worth the money! Close to everything!

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay again..”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself was not bad. The pool was nice, although dirty. The room was a decent size. Hotel staff not kind. Went in august and the location was horrible. Had to travel across bridge and hunt for very expensive parking. Not in a good location to take the bus. Next time I will stay oceanfront.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Kellybug78
Reviews.Content: What a great location!!! It is not right across the street from the beach where we usually stay but it was great. There is a Starbucks 2 doors down, Dumpsters Ice Cream right next to them, across the street are outlets and an Outback and Apleebees. We were there in early October for our honeymoon. What a huge suite. It was a very large room. Everyone was very nice and it was off-season. Breakfast was wonderful (One day was french toast the next day was waffles) The have an outdoor pool, which wasn't open for our stay but it looked so cool, slides and stuff for the kids. I would highly recommend this hotel.
